<BACKSTAGE><telerik:RadRibbonBackstage Name="BackStage" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmRadRibbonBackstageStyle}" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:telerik="http://schemas.telerik.com/2008/xaml/presentation">
<!--Das NameProperty "BSI_APP" ist bindend, es dient der Auswertung ob BackStage Application zur Anzeige gebracht werden muss--> <!--Dieses BackstageItem wird nur zur Anzeige gebracht, wenn SavePreview und WorspaceManger zusammen in einer Applikation laufen-->
<telerikRibbonView:RadRibbonBackstageItem Name="BSI_APP" HeaderForeground="Black" Header="{DynamicResource NDL0001}" IsSelectable="True" xmlns:telerikRibbonView="clr-namespace:Telerik.Windows.Controls;assembly=Telerik.Windows.Controls.RibbonView"><Grid>
<StackPanel Margin="15 15 0 0"><StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0 10 0 0"> <Button ToolTip="{DynamicResource NDL0006}" Width="35" Height="35" Name="BTN_BACKSTAGE_SP" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Background="{DynamicResource SavePreview_transparent_32x32.png}" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:ActivateSavePreviewTab>NONE" /> <Label Name="LBL_BACKSTAGE_SP" Margin="10 0 0 0" FontSize="16" VerticalContentAlignment="Center" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0006}" /> </StackPanel>
<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0 10 0 0"><Button ToolTip="{DynamicResource NDL0005}" Width="35" Height="35" Name="BTN_BACKSTAGE_WS" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:ActivateWorkSpaceManagerTab>NONE" Background="{DynamicResource WorkspaceManager_transparent_32x32.png}" /><Label Name="LBL_BACKSTAGE_WS" Margin="10 0 0 0" FontSize="16" VerticalContentAlignment="Center" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0005}" /></StackPanel> </StackPanel></Grid></telerikRibbonView:RadRibbonBackstageItem>
<telerikRibbonView:RadRibbonBackstageItem Name="BSI_INFO" HeaderForeground="Black" Header="{DynamicResource NDL0039}" IsSelectable="True" xmlns:telerikRibbonView="clr-namespace:Telerik.Windows.Controls;assembly=Telerik.Windows.Controls.RibbonView"><Grid><DockPanel Margin="20" LastChildFill="False" Name="INFODOCK">
<Label HorizontalAlignment="Right" Name="LBL_VERSION" Content="Version: TEMPLATEBINDING!" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Margin="0 0 0 10" />
<ToggleButton Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Name="TBTN_LOGGING" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmToggleButton}" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:TriggerLogging>WPFCTRL" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0008}" Margin="0 0 0 10" />
<ToggleButton Height="20" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Name="TBTN_XPLMMESSAGE" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmToggleButton}" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:TriggerXPlmMessages>WPFCTRL" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0009}" Margin="0 0 0 5" /><StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" DockPanel.Dock="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="0 0 0 0">
<Label Name="LBL_INFO_SERIALIZE_DATAMODEL" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0010}" /><Button Name="BTN_INFO_SERIALIZE_DATAMODEL" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Background="{DynamicResource Export_transparent_20x20.png}" Width="32" Height="32" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:SerializeDataModel>WPFCTRL" /></StackPanel><StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" DockPanel.Dock="Top" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Margin="0 0 0 5">
<Label Name="LBL_INFO_SHOW_DATAMODEL" Content="{DynamicResource NDL0069}" /><Button Name="BTN_INFO_SHOW_DATAMODEL" DockPanel.Dock="Top" Style="{DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Background="{DynamicResource DisplayDocument_transparent_20x20.png}" Width="32" Height="32" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:ShowSelectedDataModel>WPFCTRL" /></StackPanel></DockPanel></Grid></telerikRibbonView:RadRibbonBackstageItem>
<telerikRibbonView:RadRibbonBackstageItem Name="BSI_CLOSE" HeaderForeground="Black" Header="{DynamicResource NDL0000}" IsSelectable="False" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:BTN_WND_CLOSE_Click>NONE" xmlns:telerikRibbonView="clr-namespace:Telerik.Windows.Controls;assembly=Telerik.Windows.Controls.RibbonView" /></telerik:RadRibbonBackstage></BACKSTAGE><TOOLBAR><QuickAccessToolBar IsOverflowOpen="False" Name="QuickAccessToolBar" xmlns="http://schemas.telerik.com/2008/xaml/presentation" xmlns:av="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"><av:Button Background="#FFFFFFFF" FontSize="8" FontWeight="Bold" Style="{av:DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Name="BTN_QUICK_SP" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:ActivateSavePreviewTab>NONE" Width="20" ToolTip="{av:DynamicResource NDL0006}" StyleManager.Theme="{x:Null}">SP</av:Button><av:Button Background="#FFFFFFFF" FontSize="8" FontWeight="Bold" Style="{av:DynamicResource XPlmButton_WHITE}" Name="BTN_QUICK_WS" Tag="Click|1>DCORE>WorkspaceDialog:ActivateWorkSpaceManagerTab>NONE" Width="20" Margin="3,0,0,0" ToolTip="{av:DynamicResource NDL0005}" StyleManager.Theme="{x:Null}">WS</av:Button></QuickAccessToolBar></TOOLBAR></XPlmRibbonDialog>
